title: I Became the Youngest Sister-in-law of the Ruined Reverse Harem’s Male Leads
summary:
Reincarnated in a ruined reverse harem novel, her sisters marry the male leads while she's left dealing with their overwhelming attention.

---
I reincarnated into a tragic reverse harem novel with no dreams or hopes left, and for some reason, the heroine died. Before I could fully process the shock of the original story being not just broken but erased, my sisters began pairing up with the male leads.

The playful and obsessive emperor fell for my mature and kind eldest sister.

The stoic and strongest swordsman in the world fell for my romance-genius second sister.

The flirtatious genius of the Magic Tower fell for my cynical youngest sister.

Me? I’m only six years old, so having a love line would land me in serious trouble. Anyway, my sisters seemed to get along well with their partners and eventually held weddings. But then...

"Lilliana, call me 'oppa.'"

"I'm your favorite brother-in-law, right?"

"It's an imperial decree. My youngest sister-in-law will live in the palace and be treated like a princess."

I just want to go back to the days when it was just me and my three sisters living together!

title: Constellations of the Gods [Official]
summary:
I am Rukalis, goddess of resurrection.
Daughter of Hades and Persephone,

and **tyrant of the underworld**.

title: The Fake Rides in a Flower Kiln
The Cute Little Saintess
summary:
My mom is the naive and sweet protagonist in a tragic romance novel. My mom is also the substitute lover who escaped from the overbearing President. And I? Well, I'm the five-year-old genius hacker.

Gu Chu, a brilliant hacker, finds herself reborn in a tragic romance novel as a five-year-old cutie. Her mother is the unfortunate heroine, her father is the blind-to-reality President, and they're surrounded by scheming relatives, a two-faced aunt, and various villainous women.

Determined to protect her mother, little Gu Chu stands tall and begins to fight back. What harm could a five-year-old possibly cause? She just wants to protect her mommy and maybe inherit her President daddy's billions along the way.

title: A Mouse Biting a Dragon’s Tail
Choose your husband Carefully
summary:
After her mother's death, Elrose Basellan was cast out by her father for 14 years. With news of his passing, Elrose rushes to claim her inheritance, but can't do so unless she's married! Desperate, she prays for a husband, and the mysterious Rakshan seems to fall from the sky! They agree to a temporary union that benefits them both, but unexpected issues keep delaying their plans for divorce. Will this fake marriage become something more? Or should Elrose have chosen her husband more carefully?

---
After her mother’s death, Elrose is left alone in a monastery, while her father stripped of her of her fortune. When news of his passing reaches her, she must flee the monastery and marry within hours to claim her rightful inheritance and title. Desperate, she prays for a husband and fate brings a man to her feet. Little does she know that this man is Lachsann, the man who stole her money. Despite her mother’s warning to “choose a husband carefully,” she can’t do so in this situation and proposes to Lachsann.

“Do you have no intention of repaying me, except for your body?”

Unbeknownst to her, Lachsann isn’t just any man but the emperor’s brother and the king of mercenaries, Harkhan.

title: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
summary:
In the novel *The Emperor and the Saintess*, the male lead and heroine were able to defeat the cursed dragons and the demons, as well as the final boss of the story, with their beautiful love.

"...Haha. I'd rather die now, so I can go in peace."

Rather than having a brilliant future and being hailed as a genius mage, I just want a secure future where I can have a comfortable retirement... That's what I wish, but when this world comes to an end, I'm the final boss. Please, just let me live... However, "Wait, isn't this the male lead, Siegren? Why is he here?"

Siegren, the heroic male lead who will save the world, is dying right in front of my eyes? The male lead whose mind and body where all tattered from rolling around in the battlefield.

"Siegren, I'm sure you'll have many things to do in the future. I promise to help you achieve that."

When I saw Siegren's wounds, I made a promise. This person, who suffered because of the lines I wrote. I promise to bring him happiness, a brilliant future, and a comfortable life.

---
Evil mage Fiona Green was destined to die at the hands of the protagonist couple in *The Emperor and the Saint*. That is until the story’s author became Fiona herself! Though mistreated, cast out by her pompous family, and thrown into the battle at Heylon, Fiona is determined to use her magic for good. But things take a rather unexpected turn when she rescues the male lead, Siegren, turning him from foe to friend… Will she successfully rewrite her fate without changing the story’s happy ending?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51579678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4623950), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3170012762)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EB%82%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/2830), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57746592)

title: The supporting character has no counterattack
The Student Guardians Are Obsessed With Me
summary:
Death from overwork after working as an entrance exam cram school instructor.

When I opened my eyes, I reincarnated as a wealthy count’s daughter. In this life, I was going to not work, and live a comfortable life, however! I came to teach my twin older brother too well. Inquiries about entrance exam counseling are pouring in.

“Teacher, what is your ideal type?”

“About that… I surely like a good-looking, rich, and kind person.”

“That’s great. My uncle is exactly like that.”

The students who are trying to dig up something when there is just spare time are also a bit suspicious, but the more strange thing is their guardians.

“You have no awareness too much about how pretty you are. That’s why the one who’s always uneasy is surely me.”

Doesn’t the childhood friend who always not crossed the ambiguous line suddenly changed his attitude 180 degrees,

“The student guardian’s face-to-face talk was an excuse. I came here because I wanted to see you, so just sit down.”

The Duke, who was like an ice sculpture, got his cheeks blushed, and,

“The Lady is fun. I keep getting greedy, but surely what I’m saying is that I don’t know whether this is a really good sign.”

What was even worse, I became tangled up with the Imperial Crown Prince, whose face had never been seen.

Somehow, I became a teacher, and when I came to my senses, I became a CEO. Now that I’ve become like this, I tried to work hard earning money, but the student’s guardians won’t let me go.

“I’m sorry, but because I’m going to focus only on my work for the time being.”

I’m busy to death because of work, yet I’m in trouble because a reverse harem that wasn’t even in my destiny suddenly unfolds.

title: Limited Extra Time
summary:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52783700)

title: Baby Princess Through the Status Window
summary:
Princess Chervianne Aerveldote has lived a lonely life, and now she's being put to death for a crime she didn't commit. However, her execution turns out to be a fresh start when she wakes up as her 5-year-old self with an ability to read people's thoughts with status windows. Chervianne quickly learns how badly she misjudged everyone in the past, finding affection and betrayal in unexpected places. But will her newfound insight be enough to change her story and finally find love in her life?

---
I was condemned as a cruel villain and sentenced to death. But somehow, I was transported back to the past when I was a five-year-old child. The moment I faced my father, who looked much younger now, a strange blue window appeared before my eyes — it was a pale blue window that revealed another’s inner self.

[Alderuan Erveldote]
Role: Emperor (Lv.99)
Favorability: 90,980,984
Mood: Dear daughter I miss you

…But Father...? I assume it’s Dad's feelings but… What the Hell is going on?

[Damian Erveldote]
Mood: Glad to see my sister
Thoughts: I want to talk to you T ^ T

[Ellie]
Mood: Holding back from breaking the wall because it’s too cute
Thoughts: I’ll definitely make a commemorative collection titled “The Daily Life of a Cute Princess!”

[Karmen Kasselov]
Mood: Excited
Thoughts: Why is it that every time I see you, you are one step more beautiful? What do they feed you at my palace? Do they have a magic potion that can make everyone this beautiful?

I used to think that everyone held a grudge against me, but seeing how they treat me like that I guess that’s not true?! If what the status window tells me is true then maybe I can live a better life in this lifetime!

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/57183975)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%83%81%ED%83%9C%EC%B0%BD-%EB%B3%B4%EB%8A%94-%EC%95%84%EA%B8%B0-%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3053), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60402003)

title: Marriage Escape
summary:
Burned out from work, Yeonseul’s long-awaited vacation takes a disastrous turn when she finds herself stranded on an island. Her only company? A maddeningly handsome stranger, infuriating as he is irresistible–but with survival forcing them together, sparks fly and an impulsive marriage marked by a night neither can forget transforms their relationship into something rather intimate. But as rescue brings an end to their rendezvous, Yeonseul reluctantly resigns herself to the end of her castaway romance–except her island husband doesn’t want to, their love story far from over.

----
*Note: The English adaptation is R15. The original work is R19.*

title: I’m Sure It’s My Baby
summary:
Loa is a bottom tier adventurer who is regarded by everyone as "incompetent". The only skill he possesses is [Create Item], which is the ability to create an item in exchange for your levels. Because of this skill, Loa is still weak for his level when compared to others. However, Loa continued to raise his level without using the [Item Creation] ability in order to improve his ability as much as possible. He has been hunting low-level monsters such as slimes and goblins for a year.

When Loa finally reached Level 50, an extraordinary change happens to him. "[Item Creation] has evolved into [Magic Creation]." The [Magic Creation] skill allows you to create a new magic in exchange for levels. The more levels you sacrifice, the more powerful magic you can create. Furthermore, by using the [Item Creation] ability, you can supplement your status with powerful equipment, create high-value items, and it’s super convenient!

[Item creation] and [Magic creation] ──The two skills have a synergistic effect, and Loa achieves tremendous growth.

title: Monster Princess
summary: An old school yakuza, Nagamasa Ryumatsu, ended up losing his life due to certain circumstances. But, when he awakened to a strange sort of scenery he had never seen before, he found that he had somehow changed into a beautiful girl?!

title: Academy’s Genius Swordmaster
summary:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

title: The Law of Hunting for the Immortal King
summary: Five years ago, the male protagonist’s brother defeated the hidden boss subspecies of the fairy king in the game “The World of the Immortal King”, and then disappeared from the world. When the family gave up looking for his brother, it was only five years for the male protagonist to realize that all this might be related to the game, and for five years, he insisted on

title: The Extra is Too Strong
summary: Top Korean hunter Siu 'The Rabid Hound' Min defeated the Demon Lord with his disciples, only to be trapped in a monster-filled otherworld for 100 years. However, a century of struggles did not break Siu—it drove him to break his limits instead. Now, he returns to Earth with Pred, his mysterious partner, only to learn that his name and legacy have been erased, along with his disciples’... and that only 10 years have passed on Earth. As new conflicts arise, will Siu and Pred prevail and uncover the truth?

title: The Veteran Healer Is Overpowered
summary: Top Korean hunter Siu 'The Rabid Hound' Min defeated the Demon Lord with his disciples, only to be trapped in a monster-filled otherworld for 100 years. However, a century of struggles did not break Siu—it drove him to break his limits instead. Now, he returns to Earth with Pred, his mysterious partner, only to learn that his name and legacy have been erased, along with his disciples’... and that only 10 years have passed on Earth. As new conflicts arise, will Siu and Pred prevail and uncover the truth?

title: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
summary:
Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. 

But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

title: Auto-Hunting With Clones
summary:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

title: The Last Adventurer
summary:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.

title: My Daddy Hides His Power
summary:
Q: Describe your feelings upon discovering your trusted dad isn’t just an extra.
A: W-what the heck... Give me back my ‘Random Imperial Citizen #1’ life...

Living in a world of constant war—365 days of chaos—a simple, extra's existence was a blessing.
At least, that's what I thought.

In a small village, I enjoyed a humble life with my loving, ordinary father, James Brown, 27, the epitome of an unremarkable single dad.

Or so I believed.

“Ladies and gentlemen, presenting my father! The quintessential symbol of extras everywhere! Brown hair, brown eyes, plain and simple!”
“...”
“This man screams ‘background character,’ living a quiet life chopping wood in a mountain village with his adorable daughter. Right? ...RIGHT?”

The knight commander merely stared at me in silence.

And then, the unthinkable happened.

Behind me, my father’s worn staff began to glow with a strange, blue aura.

“...Dad?”

Before I could process what was happening, his unassuming brown hair and eyes shifted. Slowly but surely, they transformed into...

Shimmering silver locks and piercing blue eyes—practically shouting “I’m the protagonist!”

“WHAT?!”

My simple, extra life shattered into a million pieces as my dad—no, this mysterious powerhouse—gripped his weapon and snarled:
“Give me back my daughter, you bastard.”

title: Dear Anonymous Sponsor
summary:
"Miss Judith, how about spending this summer at the Curtis estate in Wilz?"  
After five years of silence, her anonymous benefactor finally replied—with an invitation to meet.  
Judith, a war orphan and secret esper, had fled to the Federation after her homeland’s defeat. In her painful life, the only warmth came from a mysterious benefactor.  
She never knew their name or face, but their generous gifts filled the void in her heart. Though she never received a reply, writing a monthly letter of gratitude became her cherished routine. So when the invitation arrived, she eagerly set off for Wilz.  
There, in the dazzling and dangerous city, she met three men: a charming rogue with an enigmatic smile, a successful businessman who cared for her, and a gang leader who clashed with her at every turn.  
One of them was her benefactor—but who?

title: What Kind of Rice Cake Is This
summary: One day, Gong Siru, who was losing interest in college life, had a pleasant campus life with the appearance of Seol Gibaek, a returning student. Shocked by Kibaek's ideal type, Siru takes her anger out with a drink and kisses someone present while drinking... A jumbled campus love story between Gong Siru who has a crush on Seol Kibaek, and Jo Chung, who becomes strangely connected to Gong Siru.

title: Odalisque
summary:
The Asmanskaya Empire is ruled by the one and only Emperor (Sultan) Suleiman.
Within his harem, female slaves live burdened with complex emotions.
There is Hürrem, who won the Emperor’s favor through fierce competition.
Some long for the honor of sharing his bed—others dread it.
Some silently endure the shame of humiliation.

And Mahasti… drowns in a forbidden love with a eunuch.

Author [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Raku_ichikawa)

title: The Villainous Husband I Killed Has Returned
summary:
After she killed her own husband, 3 years later in the last day of mourning...she found him standing on front of her asking...
"I don't remember dying, my lady! So why you wearing the mourning clothes?"

title: I Became the Mother of the Supporting Male Lead’s Son
summary:
Reincarnated as Elia, the daughter of a ruined noble, the protagonist struggles to escape debt collectors. One day, she saves a child from an attack, only to be mistaken for a kidnapper and taken to Duke Kaiden’s mansion. To avoid punishment, she becomes the child’s nanny. Now, she must clear the misunderstanding and find a way to survive in her new life.

---
The protagonist is reincarnated as 'Elia', a noblewoman and a failed novelist who is an extra character in a romance fantasy novel. Despite being chased by creditors, she saves a child from being beaten by a thug, but is framed as a kidnapper and dragged to the Duke 'Kaiden's' mansion.
 
"Do you know? If you live like that forever, everyone will leave you."

Elia, who speaks her mind, becomes a nanny instead of being punished. Will Elia be able to clear her misunderstanding?

title: If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
I Became a Sales Prodigy
summary:
Elcan, a dark magician, is fired from his party due to his lack of talent with offensive magic.  As he wandered the streets he came across twins, who were abandoned by their parents. 

"I couldn't be a good dark magician, but I want to make their lives better!" 

He decided to retire from being an adventurer and raise these two girls as his own. And so, he raised his daughters, Corona and Selena. Teaching them black magic and enrolling them in a prestigious magician’s academy. 

After learning more about magic, the girls return to see their father with some important news… They are S-rank Sages?! And they want to form a party with him?! 

A new adventure between a father and his daughters begin!

title: BJ Villainess
summary: A game developer suddenly wakes up as the villainess [Tereze] in her own reverse-harem game — now turned into a deadly cosmic broadcast. To survive, she must achieve the "True Ending" by winning over one of four male leads, despite her character being designed for tragic deaths.---TL Note: "BJ" is a Korean slang that means streamer. It stands for Bang-Jang (방장).

title: Mercenary Enrollment
summary:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

title: I Became the Successor of the Martial God
summary: One day, I suddenly became the protagonist of a game. However, the more you look at this protagonist... the more you'll sigh. He's got the worst stats, the worst talent and zero connections. But still… You have acquired [Heavenly Martial Physique]. You have become the master of the [Martial God's Tome]. “So what? I’m the ultimate veteran player!” He's not just a veteran player— he’s a full-blown obsessive maniac. Thus begins the legendary playthrough of a hardcore veteran!

title: I Will Buy Divine Power With Money!
Tamed the Monster Prince
summary: The 27-year-old Sei Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon.

title: Heavenly Inquisition Sword
summary:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

title: Would You Like to Have an Affair With Me
Will You Love me Again
summary: The college student Mamoru Suou faced a series of unfortunate events: his job search wasn't going well, and he had to leave the place he was living. However, he met a real estate agent who showed him an ideal property. It was a bit old, but the size and rent were unbeatable, so he quickly moved in... After moving in safely, that night Mamoru met Madoka, a ghost with an otherworldly beauty. Madoka touched Mamoru's neck with her seductive lips... and a night of intoxicating pleasure and terror began...

title: Path of the Shaman
summary:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

title: The Strongest Chef in Another World
summary:
Richard, a transmigrator, became a pioneering aristocrat in another world. At the time, the natives were invading the country from the front and a noble with ill intentions was plotting behind the scenes. Richard only had a few things to rely on and one of them was called... The Lord System.

Creating frontiers to build castles, finding dwarves to buy equipment and much more! Bearmen, minotaurs, goblins... all kinds of enemies were invading one after another! The road to becoming the mightiest lord begins!

title: My Contract Husband Resembles the Male Protagonist
summary:
Enya Lockhart remembers that she reincarnated into a terrible novel she once read, nicknamed Empress Impisonment. Knowing that she's fated to marry the emperor, a terrible person, she aims to avoid marriage to save her life.

She enters into a one-year contract marriage to a mercenary named Dale, in order to break off an engagement with the emperor.

Unlike the original emperor in the novel, Dale is pure, innocent, and kind.

One day, she found herself thinking...

"If I were to truly marry, it should be someone like him."

And then — something happened.

title: Another Heaven
summary:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

title: The Baby Fairy is a Villain
summary: After her sudden death at the hands of an assassin, the former granddaughter of a Yakuza boss reincarnates into an otome game as the heroine. The game is, of course, set in the time of early European mafia (but with magic and other special abilities somehow)—specifically a kingdom where the royal family is supported behind the scenes by five major crime families! "Please God, whyyy, I only wanted to life a normal life!"

title: The Fox-Eyed Villain of the Demon Academy
summary:
The very last moment before the novel was about the end, the strongest villain met a pitiful fate.

But that wasn't the end.

"So, this is how I die."

I, who was once the author, woke up as the fox-eyed villian who was never once understood.

A fallen family. A life thrown away for revenge. A future sealed in tragedy.

I'm going to rewrite it all.

This villain's end... will be reversed.

title: Honey, I Think That’s a Misunderstanding
summary: A noblewoman preparing for a political marriage keeps fainting in terror whenever she meets her intimidating fiancé—but he mistakes her fear for affection. Determined to call off the engagement, she must navigate his unexpected romanticism and family secrets.

title: Informer
summary:
'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.

title: I Became a Dead Character in a Prison for Wastes
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel… but, hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed, I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader, but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. 

“I’ll make you dead on paper, so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me, I’ll release you from prison.”
“What do you want me to do, Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me, the psycho of the prison, for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison, but in reality, it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader, I can finally be released.

“But to do that, you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel.

title: Is the Friend of a Friend a Stranger?
summary:
Seven years ago, I promised my best male friend that we would always be friends. When I reunited with him in high school, he was... the neatest and most beautiful girl in the school!? And yet, she acts the same old way only in front of me...
___
**Character Designer:** [Sisoe](https://mangadex.org/author/9a1a04cb-1d27-4601-809d-665b4f4918c4)

**Additional Sites:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tenbin_sneaker)

title: I Reincarnated As A Villainess And Became Rich
summary:
"Prepare yourself, Protagonist. With this power, I will change this predetermined future."

One day, he was suddenly reincarnated into the world of his favorite romance RPG. However, the body he had reincarnated into belonged to the 'Incompetent Evil Prince' Harold who had his engagement broken off with the heroine. On top of that, according to the setting, he wasn't able to use his magic power and would be defeated by the protagonist. But, it'll be different this time.

First, he stopped his engagement from being broken off with the heroine and started training himself. Then, he obtained a power different from the one he had in the original work, and overwhelmed everyone with the enormous magic power he shouldn't have been able to use! And before he realized it, his single-minded pursuit of strength had also gotten the attention of the other heroines...
